gov.usgs.locator

Class Hypocenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.locator.Hypocenter

  • public class Hypocenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Keep all the data for one hypocenter together.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hypocenter(double originTime, double latitude, double longitude, double depth)
      Initializes a hypocenter with enough information to start a location pass.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hypocenter

        public Hypocenter(double originTime,
                  double latitude,
                  double longitude,
                  double depth)
        Initializes a hypocenter with enough information to start a location pass.
        Parameters:
        originTime - Origin time in seconds
        latitude - Geographic latitude in degrees
        longitude - Longitude in degrees
        depth - Depth in kilometers

      • updateHypo

        public void updateHypo(double originTime,
                       double latitude,
                       double longitude,
                       double depth)
        Update the hypocentral parameters and recompute the sines and cosines.
        Parameters:
        originTime - Event origin time in seconds since the epoch
        latitude - Geographic latitude in degrees
        longitude - Longitude in degrees
        depth - Depth in kilometers

      • addBayes

        public void addBayes(double bayesDepth,
                     double bayesSpread)
        Set an analyst requested Bayesian depth.
        Parameters:
        bayesDepth - Bayesian depth in kilometers
        bayesSpread - Uncertainty of the Bayesian depth in kilometers

      • updateBayes

        public void updateBayes(double bayesDepth,
                        double bayesSpread)
        Update the Bayesian depth (if not set by an anaylst).
        Parameters:
        bayesDepth - Bayesian depth in kilometers
        bayesSpread - Uncertainty of the Bayesian depth in kilometers

      • addFlags

        public void addFlags(boolean heldLoc,
                     boolean heldDepth,
                     boolean rstt,
                     boolean noSvd)
        Add analyst command flags.
        Parameters:
        heldLoc - True if the hypocenter will be held constant
        heldDepth - True if the depth will be held constant
        rstt - True if regional phases will use the RSTT model
        noSvd - True to not use the de-correlation algorithm

      • printIn

        public void printIn()
        Print out the input hypocenter information in a format similar to the Hydra event input file.

      • printHydra

        public void printHydra(int noStations,
                       int stationsUsed,
                       int noPicks,
                       int picksUsed)
        Print the hypocenter part of a Bulletin Hydra style output file.

      • printNEIC

        public void printNEIC(int noStations,
                      int noPicks)
        Print the hypocenter in a way similar to the NEIC web format.
        Parameters:
        noStations - Number of stations associated
        noPicks - Number of picks associated
